is ignored

enabled|has been enabled!

metrics-fail|Failed to enable plugin metrics!
dev-build|You appear to be running a development build of MGLib. As such, plugins using the library may not work correctly. If you're a developer, we strongly recommend building against a alpha/beta/release version of the library.
uuid-fail|Failed to fetch UUIDs of online players!

arena-not-exists|The specified arena does not exist!

invalid-sign-type|Invalid sign type!

resetting|RESETTING

in-round|You are already in a round!
round-full|This round is full!

no-pms|You may not send private messages during an active round!
spectating|You are now spectating and have been made invisible!
flight-enabled|Additionally, you are now capable of flight.

inv-save-fail|Failed to save inventory to disk!

no-join-progress|You may not join a round in progress!
